teaser.caption: Part 1: Coding standards
teaser.text:
The 12th paradigm of Extreme Programming:
Coding Standards: Everyone codes to the same standards. Ideally, you shouldn't be able to tell by looking at it who on the team has touched a specific piece of code.

teaser.caption: Part 2: Participating in development
teaser.text:
Want to join the XP team? Well, there are some prerequisites...
First of all, it is assumed you have read the coding standards (see above).
Second, you might want to subscribe to the developer's mailing list.
Third, have a look at some of the tips listed - they are substantial in developing clean (and XP-conformant) sourcecode.
